short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Building chrome extension that tracks how long you visited and how many times you visited a website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that tracks user's visits, daily time spent and their total time spent on a website, this enables users to become more mindful of how much time they spend on any site when they need to focus.
